MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping copies the data from the SQL Server table FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM to an Oracle table FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM
MAPPING.NAME: m_FCST_FNSHED_PROD_ITEM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This expression passes the data from source table FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM to target table FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This lookup is used to get the records from ITEM table for the ITEM_CODE and LEGACY_SOURCE from source.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_ITEM

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT ITEM.ABC_CODE as ABC_CODE, ITEM.APS_CORP_BUSINESS_UNIT as APS_CORP_BUSINESS_UNIT, ITEM.APS_STYLE_CD as APS_STYLE_CD, ITEM.APS_COLOR_CD as APS_COLOR_CD, ITEM.ATTRIBUTE_CODE as ATTRIBUTE_CODE, ITEM.SIZE_CODE as SIZE_CODE, ITEM.SIZE_DESC as SIZE_DESC, ITEM.PACK_CODE as PACK_CODE, ITEM.PACK_QTY as PACK_QTY, ITEM.LEGACY_SOURCE as LEGACY_SOURCE, ITEM.ITEM_CODE as ITEM_CODE FROM ITEM WITH (NOLOCK)

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches data from source FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.LEGACY_SOURCE, FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.ITEM_CODE, FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.STYLE, FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.COLOR, FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.CUMULATIVE_LEADTIME, FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.DEMAND_DRIVER, FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.BUSINESS_GROUP FROM FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM WITH (NOLOCK)

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: CORP_BUSINESS_UNIT = APS_CORP_BUSINESS_UNIT_IN AND STYLE_CD = APS_STYLE_CD_IN AND COLOR_CD = APS_COLOR_CD_IN

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This expression passes the data from source table FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM to target table FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM.
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This lookup is used to get the records from ITEM table for the ITEM_CODE and LEGACY_SOURCE from source.
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_ITEM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches data from source FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM table.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Save session log for these runs
Session Log File Max Time Period

WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_s_m_FCST_FNSHED_PROD_ITEM

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This session copies the data from the SQL Server table FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM to an Oracle table FCST_DPR_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ITEM
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_FCST_FNSHED_PROD_ITEM
